greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Product_{d|n, d+1 is prime} prime(1+A286561(n,d+1)), where A286561(n,k) gives the k-valuation of n (for k > 1).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
program: (PARI) A322312(n) = { my(m=1,p); fordiv(n,d,p=1+d; if(isprime(p), for(i=0,oo,if(n%(p^i),m *= prime(i);break)))); (m); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 03 2018
